definition: entrance exam for senior middle school
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
to check/to verify/to test/to examine/to take an exam/to take an entrance exam for/deceased father

sentences.english: But I did bad in the Final Exam.
sentences.chinese: 但我卻在期末考試中考砸了。

sentences.english: It means a lot more when you do your mid-term, you're worried about the errors.
sentences.chinese: 在你期中考試的時候，你擔心出錯。

sentences.english: All of my mid-terms tended to be during one week
sentences.chinese: 我所有的期中考試都安排在了同一個星期。

sentences.english: Sample midterm exams and answers are provided here.
Mid-term examination will arrive at soon , I am able to make great efforts to finish getting achievement.
sentences.chinese: 期中考試快到了，我會努力取得好成績。

sentences.english: WCCC can free the students from the puzzle of examination-education and can also make the students get ideal results in exams.
sentences.chinese: 擺脫應試教育的困擾，而又能在考試中考出理想成績。

sentences.english: The mid-term exams have finished, in which case we can plan for an outgoing.
sentences.chinese: 既然期中考試已經結束，那我們可以考慮出去郊遊了。

sentences.english: The mid-semester exams are finally over!
sentences.chinese: 期中考的折磨終於給我熬過了。

sentences.english: The students in our school can be admitted propriety by No. 1 Middle School.
sentences.chinese: 我校學生中考可被華師一高中部適當優惠錄取。

sentences.english: We have just concluded a three-day examination period.
sentences.chinese: 我們剛剛結束了爲期三天的期中考試。

sentences.english: Are you worried about passing the midterm exam, or do you feel secure.
sentences.chinese: 你在擔心怎麼通過期中考試還是你根本就很放心？

sentences.english: I'm great. Have you finished your midterm exams ?
sentences.chinese: 我也很好，你考完所有的期中考試了麼？

sentences.english: Reform the admission system of the senior schools.
Two hours were allowed for the final examination.
sentences.chinese: 期中考試限兩小時交卷。

sentences.english: I've got a really bad grade on my test.
sentences.chinese: 我在一門測試中考了一個很差的成績。

definition: college entrance exam (especially as abbr. for 普通高等學校招生全國統一考試|普通高等学校招生全国统一考试[Pu3 tong1 Gao1 deng3 Xue2 xiao4 Zhao1 sheng1 Quan2 guo2 Tong3 yi1 Kao3 shi4])/(Tw) entrance exam for senior government service posts (abbr. for 公務人員高等考試|公务人员高等考试)
to enter the next grade school
junior high school/abbr. for 初級中學|初级中学[chu1 ji2 zhong1 xue2]
student who repeats (a course, grade etc) at school
third year in junior middle school
literature and language/(PRC) Chinese (as a school subject)
